item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: I'd say it is on the oval side, close to a Shoei in my opinion, but you have to be careful of the shell sizes the X-Lites come in. I'm used to a Small in other brands, which share the same shell size as Mediums... but a small on this X802 has its own, smaller shell size. This made the fit way too small for me.
item.content:encoded: I’d say it is on the oval side, close to a Shoei in my opinion, but you have to be careful of the shell sizes the X-Lites come in. I’m used to a Small in other brands, which share the same shell size as Mediums… but a small on this X802 has its own, smaller shell size. This made the fit way too small for me.

item.title: By: Sam
item.dc:creator: Sam
item.description: What headshape do you think the X802 has? I'm looking for a replacement to my Shark RSR2 (tight lid). Can't seem to find a lot about headshape but hopefully it'll be on the oval side.
item.content:encoded: What headshape do you think the X802 has? I’m looking for a replacement to my Shark RSR2 (tight lid). Can’t seem to find a lot about headshape but hopefully it’ll be on the oval side.
